name: Chocolate Cupcakes Grain-Free and Gluten-Free
description: These easy vegan Chocolate Cupcakes are fluffy and light yet rich and chocolatey at the same time! Perfect for birthday parties or bridal showers! Gluten-free, grain-free, and made in one bowl! Makes 12 mini cupcakes
recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp  non dairy milk or non dairy yogurt
1/2 cup club soda (or similar fizzy drink.)
Frosting or chocolate chips to add to the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine all the dry ingredients until well mixed. Press and mix to break any almond flour lumps, and starch lumps so that the mixture is homogenous.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine all the dry ingredients until well mixed. Press and mix to break any almond flour lumps, and starch lumps so that the mixture is homogenous.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil, vanilla extract, milk, and 1/2 cup Club Soda, or any other carbonated drink you're using, and mix in. The batter should be a little thicker than pancake batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oil, vanilla extract, milk, and 1/2 cup Club Soda, or any other carbonated drink you're using, and mix in. The batter should be a little thicker than pancake batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix it lightly and let it sit for half a minute and then mix it again to check.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix it lightly and let it sit for half a minute and then mix it again to check.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep your mini muffin pan by lining it with parchment paper cubs, or parchment paper liners. and preheat the oven to 375 F.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep your mini muffin pan by lining it with parchment paper cubs, or parchment paper liners. and preheat the oven to 375 F.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the batter into the mini muffin pan, filling up 3/4 of each of the muffin liners.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the batter into the mini muffin pan, filling up 3/4 of each of the muffin liners.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for  15-17  minutes for mini cupcake pan (22 to 25 mins for regular)  Check with a toothpick at the center and then remove from the oven. Let the cupcakes cool in the pan for ten minutes, then remove from the pan. Let them cool completely before frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for  15-17  minutes for mini cupcake pan (22 to 25 mins for regular)  Check with a toothpick at the center and then remove from the oven. Let the cupcakes cool in the pan for ten minutes, then remove from the pan. Let them cool completely before frosting.

keywords: chocolate cupcake recipe, glutenfree cupcakes, vegan cupcake recipe
